Add or remove a parameter from a data table

1 Click the Patient Summary button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Patient Summary.

2 Click the Real-Time tab or the Laboratory tab.

3 In the Table ID box, select the code or title for the table you want to edit.

4 Click Setup.

5 In the Available Variables or Available Analyses box, select the parameters you want to add to the table. Then click Add >>.

6 In the Selected Variables or Selected Analyses box, select the parameters you want to remove from the table. Then click << Remove.

7 Click OK.
